actionCalls.name: Alert_That_Opportunity_Was_Closed_Won_bc
actionCalls.label: Alert That Opportunity Was Closed Won

assignments.name: Acct_Type_Client_Registered_to_Partner
assignments.label: Acct Type = Client - Registered to Partner

formulas.name: Acct_HS_Lifecycle_Stage
formulas.expression: IF(ISPICKVAL({!$Record.StageName}, 'Discovery'), 'Value Aware', IF(ISPICKVAL({!$Record.StageName}, 'Scope'), 'Technically Aware', IF(ISPICKVAL({!$Record.StageName}, 'Go/No Go'), 'Commit', IF(ISPICKVAL({!$Record.StageName}, 'Business Case/ROI'), 'Align', IF(ISPICKVAL({!$Record.StageName}, 'TVE/POC'), 'Prove', IF(ISPICKVAL({!$Record.StageName}, 'Contractual'), 'Kickoff', IF(ISPICKVAL({!$Record.StageName}, 'Closed Won'), 'Customer', {!TEXT(Account_get.Hubspot_Lifecycle_Stage__c}))))))))

textTemplates.name: QualifyBodyTemplate
textTemplates.text:
Dear {!$Record.Primary_Contact_Name__c}


We have performed an introductory review of your request for {!$Record.Name} and we have assigned a preliminary estimate amount of ${!$Record.Amount} for this custom development project. If you would like to proceed, we will continue with further investigation in order to finalize the requirements and further refine the estimate.


Please respond to this email if you approve this preliminary estimate amount and would like us to continue scoping these requirements. If approved, Cavallo may reach out to schedule a discovery call to further discuss requirements. A Budgetary Estimate document will be provided for your review once the requirements and estimate have been finalized. Signing that document will initiate the custom development project.


If you do not wish to move forward, no action is needed, as this preliminary estimate will expire in 30 days. You may respond to decline if you wish it to be closed immediately.


{!$Record.Budget_Qualification_Note__c}


Thank you,

Cavallo Custom Development Team
